short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the order/formatting of the Entries page of milesplit.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides options for reformatting the milesplit.com "View/Print Confirmation" page before printing.

You can re-order the events, select which events to show and hide, and choose the order of the teams (ie, boys before girls).

If you have problems with repeat usage, refresh the page and re-open the extension.
